contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 31, 1999 D Rochdale Contest (Championship Section)
Rochdale Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Rochdale Annual Brass Band Festival rochdale-contest-championship-section
Rochdale Town Hall, Rochdale, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £250, 2nd £175, 3rd £100. Best cornet section - Stalybridge. 10 bands competed
June 29, 2015, 8:57 a.m. April 2, 2017, 9:30 p.m.
1 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) Derek Renshaw Connotations
2 Stalybridge Old Band David Hirst Contest Music
3 Ashton Band Martyn Evans English Heritage
4 Yorkshire Co-op Brass Band John Roberts The Essence of Time
5 Blackburn and Darwen Band Eric Landon The Essence of Time
6 Dobcross Silver Band James Cant The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
7 Cottingham Band Richard Grantham The Year of the Dragon
8 Tyldesley Band Darrol Barry Tam O'Shanter's Ride [Wright]
9 Haydock Band John Maines Le Carnaval Romain [unknown arranger]
10 Morecambe Brass Band Andrew Warriner Le Carnaval Romain [unknown arranger]
